intro: Kyllinga elongata, commonly known as slender spikerush, is a herbaceous plant belonging to the family Cyperaceae. It is characterized by its tall, slender stems that often exceed 1 meter in height, with narrow, grass-like leaves. The plant produces small, spike-like clusters of flowers at the top of the stems, which are typically green or reddish in color. It thrives in wet or marshy environments, often found in tropical and subtropical regions. Kyllinga elongata is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive appearance and ability to thrive in moist conditions.
